verses.verse: Jesus <WG2424> therefore<WG3767> six<WG1803> days<WG2250> before<WG4253> the passover<WG3957> came<WG2064> to<WG1519> Bethany<WG963>, where<WG3699> Lazarus<WG2976> was<WG2258>, whom<WG3739> Jesus raised<WG1453> from<WG1537> the dead<WG2348>.

So <WG1563> they made<WG4160> him<WG846> a supper<WG1173> there<WG1563>: and<WG2532> Martha<WG3136> served<WG1247>; but<WG1161> Lazarus<WG2976> was<WG2258> one<WG1520> of them that sat at meat with him<WG3767>.

Mary <WG3137> therefore<WG3767> took<WG2983> a pound<WG3046> of ointment<WG3464> of pure nard<WG3487>, very precious<WG4186>, and anointed<WG218> the feet<WG4228> of Jesus<WG2424>, and<WG1161> wiped<WG1591> his<WG846> feet<WG4228> with<WG2359> her<WG846> hair<WG2359>: and<WG1161> the house<WG3614> was filled<WG4137> with<WG1537> the odor<WG3744> of the ointment<WG4101>.
But <WG3767> Judas<WG2455> Iscariot<WG2469>, <WG4613> one<WG1520> of<WG1537> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>, that should<WG3195> betray<WG3860> him<WG846>, saith<WG3004>,
Why was<WG5101> not<WG3756> this<WG5124> ointment<WG3464> sold<WG4097> for<WG1223> three hundred<WG5145> shillings<WG1220>, and<WG2532> given<WG1325> to the poor<WG4434>?

Now this<WG5124> he said<WG2036>, not<WG3756> because<WG3754> he<WG846> cared<WG3199> for<WG4012> the poor<WG4434>; but<WG235> because<WG3754> he was<WG2258> a thief<WG2812>, and<WG2532> having<WG2192> the bag<WG1101> took<WG941> away what was put therein<WG1161>.
Jesus <WG2424> therefore<WG3767> said<WG2036>, Suffer<WG863> her846, 863 to keep<WG5083> it<WG846> against<WG1519> the day<WG2250> of<WG1780> my<WG3450> burying<WG1780>.
For <WG1063> the poor<WG4434> ye have<WG2192> always<WG3842> with<WG3326> you<WG1438>; but<WG1161> me<WG1691> ye have<WG2192> not<WG3756> always<WG3842>.

The common<WG4183> people<WG3793> therefore<WG3767> of<WG1537> the Jews<WG2453> learned<WG1097> that<WG3754> he was<WG2076> there<WG1563>: and<WG2532> they came<WG2064>, not<WG3756> for<WG1223> Jesus<WG2424>' sake<WG1223> only<WG3440>, but<WG235> that<WG2443> they might see<WG1492> Lazarus<WG2976> also<WG2532>, whom<WG3739> he had raised<WG1453> from<WG1537> the dead<WG3498>.
But <WG1161> the chief priests<WG749> took counsel<WG1011> that<WG2443> they might put<WG615> Lazarus<WG2976> also<WG2532> to death<WG615>;
because <WG3754> that by reason of<WG1223> him<WG846> many<WG4183> of the Jews<WG2453> went away<WG5217>, and<WG2532> believed<WG4100> on<WG1519> Jesus<WG2424>.

On the morrow<WG1887> a great<WG4183> multitude<WG3793> that<WG3588> had come<WG2064> to<WG1519> the feast<WG1859>, when they heard<WG191> that<WG3754> Jesus<WG2424> was coming<WG2064> to<WG1519> Jerusalem<WG2414>,

took <WG2983> the branches<WG902> of the palm trees<WG5404>, and<WG2532> went<WG1831> forth<WG1519> to meet<WG5222> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> cried<WG2896> out<WG5614>, Hosanna: Blessed<WG2127> is he that cometh<WG2064> in<WG1722> the name<WG3686> of the Lord<WG2962>, even the King<WG935> of Israel<WG2474>.
And <WG1161> Jesus<WG2424>, having found<WG2147> a young ass<WG3678>, sat<WG2523> thereon<WG1909>; as<WG2531> it is<WG2076> written<WG846>,
Fear <WG5399> not<WG3361>, daughter<WG2364> of Zion<WG4622>: behold<WG2400>, thy<WG4675> King<WG935> cometh<WG2064>, sitting<WG2521> on<WG1909> an ass<WG3688>'s colt<WG4454>.

These things<WG5023> understood<WG1097> not<WG3756> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101> at the first<WG4413>: but<WG235> when<WG3753> Jesus<WG2424> was glorified<WG1392>, then<WG5119> remembered they<WG3415> that<WG3754> these things<WG5023> were<WG2258> written<WG1125> of<WG1909> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> that they had done<WG4160> these things<WG5023> unto him<WG1161>.

The multitude<WG3793> therefore<WG3767> that was<WG5607> with<WG3326> him<WG846> when<WG3753> he called<WG5455> Lazarus<WG2976> out of<WG1537> the tomb<WG3419>, and<WG2532> raised<WG1453> him<WG846> from<WG1537> the dead<WG3498>, bare witness<WG3140>.

For <WG1223> this<WG5124> cause<WG1223> also<WG2532> the multitude<WG3793> went and met<WG5221> him<WG846>, for that<WG3754> they heard that<WG191> he<WG846> had done<WG4160> this<WG5124> sign<WG4592>.

The Pharisees<WG5330> therefore<WG3767> said<WG2036> among<WG4314> themselves<WG1438>, Behold how<WG3754> ye<WG2334> prevail<WG5623> nothing<WG3762>: lo<WG1492>, the world<WG2889> is gone<WG565> after<WG3694> him<WG3756>.
Now <WG1161> there were<WG2258> certain<WG5100> Greeks<WG1672> among<WG1537> those that went up<WG305> to worship<WG4352> at<WG1722> the feast<WG2443>:

these <WG3778> therefore<WG3767> came<WG4334> to Philip<WG5376>, who was of<WG575> Bethsaida<WG966> of Galilee<WG1056>, and<WG2532> asked<WG2065> him<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, Sir<WG2962>, we would<WG2309> see<WG1492> Jesus<WG2424>.
Philip <WG5376> cometh<WG2064> and<WG2532> telleth<WG3004> Andrew<WG406>: 2532, 3825 Andrew<WG406> cometh<WG2532>, and Philip<WG5376>, and they tell<WG3004> Jesus<WG2424>.
And <WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> answereth<WG611> them<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, The hour<WG5610> is come<WG2064>, that<WG2443> the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> should be glorified<WG1392>.

Verily <WG281>, verily<WG281>, I say<WG3004> unto you<WG5213>, Except<WG1437> a grain<WG2848> of wheat<WG4621> fall<WG4098> into<WG1519> the earth<WG1093> and die<WG599>, it<WG846> abideth<WG3306> by itself alone<WG3441>; but<WG1161> if<WG1437> it die<WG599>, it beareth<WG5342> much<WG4183> fruit<WG3361>.

He that loveth<WG5368> his<WG846> life<WG5590> loseth<WG622> it<WG846>; and<WG2532> he that hateth<WG3404> his<WG846> life<WG5590> in<WG1722> this<WG5129> world<WG2889> shall keep<WG5442> it<WG846> unto<WG1519> life<WG2222> eternal<WG166>.

If <WG1437> any man<WG5100> serve<WG1247> me<WG1698>, let him follow<WG190> me<WG1698>; and<WG2532> where<WG3699> I<WG1473> am<WG1510>, there<WG1563> shall<WG2071> also<WG2532> my<WG1699> servant<WG1249> be<WG2071>: if<WG1437> any man<WG5100> serve<WG1247> me<WG1698>, him<WG846> will<WG5091> the Father<WG3962> honor<WG2532>.

Now <WG3568> is<WG5015> my<WG3450> soul<WG5590> troubled<WG5015>; and<WG2532> what<WG5101> shall I say<WG2036>? Father<WG3962>, save<WG4982> me<WG3165> from<WG1537> this<WG3778> hour<WG5610>. But<WG235> for<WG1223> this<WG5124> cause<WG1223> came I<WG2064> unto<WG1519> this<WG3778> hour<WG5610>.

Father <WG3962>, glorify<WG1392> thy<WG4675> name<WG3686>. There<WG2064> came therefore<WG3767> a voice<WG5456> out<WG1537> of heaven<WG3772>, saying<WG1392>, I have both<WG2532> glorified<WG1392> it<WG2532>, and will glorify<WG1392> it again<WG3825>.

The multitude<WG3767> therefore<WG3793>, that stood by<WG2476>, and<WG2532> heard<WG191> it<WG3004>, said that it<WG1096> had thundered<WG1027>: others<WG243> said<WG2980>, An angel<WG32> hath spoken<WG2980> to him<WG846>.
Jesus <WG2424> answered<WG611> and<WG2532> said<WG2036>, This<WG3778> voice<WG5456> hath not<WG3756> come<WG1096> for my<WG1691> sake<WG1223>, but<WG235> for<WG1223> your<WG5209> sakes<WG1223>.
Now <WG3568> is<WG2076> the judgment<WG2920> of<WG2889> this<WG5127> world<WG2889>: now<WG3568> shall<WG1544> the prince<WG758> of<WG2889> this<WG5127> world<WG2889> be cast<WG1544> out<WG1854>.
And I<WG2504>, if<WG1437> I be lifted up<WG5312> from<WG1537> the earth<WG1093>, will draw<WG1670> all<WG3956> men unto<WG4314> myself<WG1683>.
But this<WG5124> he said<WG3004>, signifying<WG4591> by what<WG4169> manner of death<WG2288> he should<WG3195> die<WG1161>.

The multitude<WG3793> therefore answered<WG611> him<WG846>, We<WG2249> have heard<WG191> out<WG1537> of the law<WG3551> that<WG3754> the Christ<WG5547> abideth<WG3306> for<WG1519> ever<WG165>: and<WG2532> how<WG4459> sayest<WG3004> thou<WG4771>, The Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> must<WG1163> be lifted up<WG5312>? who<WG5101> is<WG2076> this<WG3778> Son<WG5207> of man<WG3754>?

Jesus <WG2424> therefore<WG3767> said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, Yet<WG2089> a little<WG3398> while<WG5550> is<WG2076> the light<WG5457> among<WG3326> you<WG5216>. Walk<WG4043> while<WG2193> ye have<WG2192> the light<WG5457>, that darkness<WG4653> overtake<WG2638> you<WG5209> not<WG2443>: and<WG2532> he that walketh<WG4043> in<WG1722> the darkness<WG4653> knoweth<WG1492> not<WG3756> whither<WG4226> he goeth<WG3361>.

While <WG2193> ye have<WG2192> the light<WG5457>, believe<WG4100> on<WG1519> the light<WG5457>, that<WG2443> ye may become<WG1096> sons<WG5207> of light<WG5457>. These things<WG5023> spake<WG2980> Jesus<WG2424>, and<WG2532> he departed<WG565> and hid himself<WG2928> from<WG575> them<WG846>.
But <WG1161> though<WG4160> he<WG846> had done<WG4160> so many<WG5118> signs<WG4592> before<WG1715> them<WG846>, yet they believed<WG4100> not<WG3756> on<WG1519> him<WG846>:

that <WG2443> the word<WG3056> of Isaiah<WG2268> the prophet<WG4396> might be fulfilled<WG4137>, which<WG3739> he spake<WG2036>, Lord<WG2962>, who<WG5101> hath believed<WG4100> our<WG2257> report<WG189>? And<WG2532> to whom<WG5101> hath<WG601> the arm<WG1023> of the Lord<WG2962> been revealed<WG601>?
For this cause<WG1223> they could<WG1410> not<WG3756> believe<WG4100>, for<WG3754> that<WG5124> Isaiah<WG2268> said<WG2036> again<WG3825>,

He hath blinded<WG5186> their<WG846> eyes<WG3788>, and<WG2532> he hardened<WG4456> their<WG846> heart<WG2588>; <WG2443> Lest<WG3361> they should<WG1492> see<WG1492> with<WG3788> their eyes<WG3788>, and<WG2532> perceive<WG3539> with<WG2588> their heart<WG2588>, And<WG2532> should turn<WG1994>, And<WG2532> I should heal<WG2390> them<WG846>.
These things<WG5023> said<WG2036> Isaiah<WG2268>, because<WG3753> he saw<WG1492> his<WG846> glory<WG1391>; and<WG2532> he spake<WG2980> of<WG4012> him<WG846>.

Nevertheless <WG3676> even of<WG1537> the rulers758, 2532 many<WG4183> believed<WG4100> on<WG1519> him<WG846>; but<WG235> because<WG1223> of the Pharisees<WG5330> they did<WG3670> not<WG3756> confess<WG3670> it<WG2443>, lest they should be<WG1096> put out of the synagogue<WG3361>:
for <WG1063> they loved<WG25> the glory<WG1391> that is of men<WG444> more<WG3123> than<WG2260> the glory<WG1391> that is of God<WG2316>.

And <WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> cried<WG2896> and<WG2532> said<WG2036>, He that believeth<WG4100> on<WG1519> me<WG1691>, believeth<WG4100> not<WG3756> on<WG1519> me<WG1691>, but<WG235> on<WG1519> him that sent<WG3992> me<WG1161>.
And <WG2532> he that beholdeth<WG2334> me<WG1691> beholdeth<WG2334> him that sent<WG3992> me<WG3165>.

I <WG1473> am come<WG2064> a light<WG5457> into<WG1519> the world<WG2889>, that<WG2443> whosoever<WG3956> believeth<WG4100> on<WG1519> me<WG1691> may<WG3306> not<WG3361> abide<WG3306> in<WG1722> the darkness<WG4653>.

And <WG2532> if<WG1437> any man<WG5100> hear<WG191> my<WG3450> sayings<WG4487>, and<WG2532> keep<WG4100> them not<WG3361>, I<WG1473> judge<WG2919> him<WG846> not<WG3756>: for<WG1063> I came<WG2064> not<WG3756> to<WG2443> judge<WG2919> the world<WG2889>, but<WG235> to<WG2443> save<WG4982> the world<WG2919>.

He that rejecteth<WG114> me<WG1691>, and<WG2532> receiveth<WG2983> not<WG3361> my<WG3450> sayings<WG2192>, hath one that<WG3739> judgeth<WG2919> him<WG846>: the word<WG3056> that<WG3739> I spake<WG2980>, the same<WG1565> shall judge<WG2919> him<WG846> in<WG1722> the last<WG2078> day<WG2250>.

For <WG3754> I1473, 2980 spake<WG2980> not<WG3756> from<WG1537> myself<WG1683>; but<WG235> the Father<WG3962> that sent<WG3992> me<WG3165>, he<WG846> hath given<WG1325> me<WG3427> a commandment<WG1785>, what<WG5101> I should say<WG2036>, and<WG2532> what<WG5101> I should speak<WG2980>.

And <WG2532> I know<WG1492> that<WG3754> his<WG846> commandment<WG1785> is<WG2076> life<WG2222> eternal<WG166>: the things<WG3739> therefore<WG3767> which I<WG1473> speak<WG2980>, even as<WG2531> the Father<WG3962> hath said<WG2046> unto me<WG3427>, so<WG3779> I speak<WG2980>.
